Read a specific meta-regression dataset by id

Source: R/metareg.R
metareg_read.Rd

Read a specific meta-regression dataset by id

Usage

metareg_read(id)

Arguments

id

Dataset id as shown in metareg_manifest().

Value

A data.frame with columns including yi, vi, measure and the available moderators.

Examples

#'   ids <- metareg_datasets()
  dat <- metareg_read(ids[1])
#> Error: object 'ids' not found
  str(dat)
#> 'data.frame':	1555 obs. of  23 variables:
